snippet.title: Reignite your soul at the next Peregian Originals
snippet.content: THE Hanlon Brothers - one of Queensland's finest soul, funk and reggae outfits - will headline the next Peregian Originals on Sunday, August 13. The six-piece act from Burleigh Heads will round out an afternoon of super-talented musicians. The Sunshine Coast's own Andrea Kirwin will be in fine form, bringing five supporting members to the stage. Sydney touring act Billy Fox and the Coast's Favourite Son also feature on the afternoon program. The four live acts will be at Peregian Beach Park from 1-5pm for the all-ages, family-friendly concert. Peregian Originals is held on the second Sunday of every month, hosted by the not-for-profit group The East Coast Originals. The East Coast Originals runs a number of live music events in small communities to support, nurture and develop the local arts and music scene. Each Originals event depends heavily on the contribution of the local community through financial contributions, donations, volunteering of time and services and through active participation. I f you would like to be a part of the Originals, visit Baby whale rescued on the Sunshine Coast Up to $214,000 remains on table for refocused investigation Tensions simmered over in restaurant hygiene dispute.
